{/* Project Header */}
Back to Projects

SolvaAI

Legal AI System

{/* Project Content */}

Project Overview

SolvaAI is a legal AI system designed to automate the process of solving legal cases by providing comprehensive legal opinions. This project integrates cutting-edge AI technology with legal expertise to streamline legal research and analysis.

Key Features

  • Legal Document Analysis: The system can analyze legal documents, contracts, and case files to extract relevant information.
  • Case Matching: SolvaAI compares current cases with past precedents to provide guidance on legal strategies.
  • Opinion Generation: Using the OpenAI API, the system generates comprehensive legal opinions with citations and references.
  • Interactive Dashboard: A user-friendly dashboard built with ReactJS allows legal professionals to interact with the system effectively.

Technical Implementation

The SolvaAI project was built using a robust technology stack:

  • Frontend: React.js with modern UI components for an intuitive user experience
  • Backend: Node.js server handling API requests, authentication, and business logic
  • Database: PostgreSQL for storing case data, user information, and historical legal opinions
  • AI Integration: OpenAI API for natural language processing and legal opinion generation

Challenges and Solutions

One of the major challenges in developing SolvaAI was ensuring the accuracy and reliability of the AI-generated legal opinions. To address this:

  • We implemented a comprehensive validation system where experienced legal professionals review the AI outputs.
  • We created a feedback loop to continuously train and improve the AI model based on expert corrections.
  • We developed a confidence scoring system to flag opinions that might need additional human review.

Results and Impact

SolvaAI has significantly improved the efficiency of legal research and opinion drafting. Early adopters of the system have reported:

  • 60% reduction in time spent on legal research
  • Increased consistency in legal opinions across different cases
  • Better accessibility to legal expertise for smaller firms and underserved communities

Project Details

Duration

3 months

Role

Full Stack Developer

Technologies Used

{['OpenAI API', 'ReactJS', 'NodeJS', 'PostgreSQL', 'Tailwind CSS', 'Docker'].map((tech, index) => ( {tech} ))}

Key Achievements

  • Reduced legal research time by 60%
  • Implemented expert feedback system
  • Designed intuitive user interface
